akn:content.akn:p:
§ 583k–4. Cooperative agreements(a) In generalThe Secretary may enter into a cooperative agreement with any State, tribal, local governmental, and private entity to carry out this subchapter.
(b) ContentsCooperative agreements authorized under this section may—(1) improve trail maintenance in a priority area;
(2) implement the strategy; or
(3) advance trail maintenance in a manner deemed appropriate by the Secretary.
(Pub. L. 114–245, § 6, Nov. 28, 2016, 130 Stat. 994.)
(a) In general The Secretary may enter into a cooperative agreement with any State, tribal, local governmental, and private entity to carry out this subchapter.
